smas.name: Smas {fastLength} {mediumLength} {slowLength}
smas.script:
plotline(sma($price.close, options.fastLength), color=options.fastColor)
plotline(sma($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
plotline(sma($price.close, options.slowLength), color=options.slowColor)

emas.name: Emas {fastLength} {mediumLength} {slowLength}
emas.script:
plotline(ema($price.close, options.fastLength), color=options.fastColor)
plotline(ema($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
plotline(ema($price.close, options.slowLength), color=options.slowColor)

cmas.name: Cmas {fastLength} {mediumLength} {slowLength}
cmas.script:
plotline(cma($price.close, options.fastLength), color=options.fastColor)
plotline(cma($price.close, options.mediumLength), color=options.mediumColor)
plotline(cma($price.close, options.slowLength), color=options.slowColor)

bbands.name: bbands {length} {multi}
bbands.script:
ma = sma($price.close, options.length)
std = stdev($price.close, options.length)
plotline(ma, color=options.basisColor)
plotline(ma + options.multi * std, color=options.upperColor)
plotline(ma - options.multi * std, color=options.lowerColor)

volume_delta.name: Volume Î”
volume_delta.script: plothistogram({ time: time, value: Math.abs(vbuy-vsell), color: vbuy - vsell > 0 ? options.upColor : options.downColor})

btccvdperp.name: CVD (BTC PERP)
btccvdperp.script: plotline(cum((BITMEX:XBTUSD.vbuy + BITFINEX:BTCF0:USTF0.vbuy + OKEX:BTC-USD-SWAP.vbuy + OKEX:BTC-USDT-SWAP.vbuy + BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vbuy + BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vbuy + HUOBI:BTC-USD.vbuy + KRAKEN:PI_XBTUSD.vbuy + DERIBIT:BTC-PERPETUAL.vbuy + FTX:BTC-PERP.vbuy + BYBIT:BTCUSD.vbuy) - (BITMEX:XBTUSD.vsell + BITFINEX:BTCF0:USTF0.vsell + OKEX:BTC-USD-SWAP.vsell + OKEX:BTC-USDT-SWAP.vsell + BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.vsell + BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.vsell + HUOBI:BTC-USD.vsell + KRAKEN:PI_XBTUSD.vsell + DERIBIT:BTC-PERPETUAL.vsell + FTX:BTC-PERP.vsell + BYBIT:BTCUSD.vsell)))

btccvdspot.name: CVD (BTC SPOT)
btccvdspot.script: plotline(cum((BITFINEX:BTCUSD.vbuy+ BINANCE:btcusdt.vbuy+ OKEX:BTC-USDT.vbuy+ KRAKEN:XBT/USD.vbuy+ COINBASE:BTC-USD.vbuy+ POLONIEX:USDT_BTC.vbuy+ HUOBI:btcusdt.vbuy+ BITSTAMP:btcusd.vbuy) - (BITFINEX:BTCUSD.vsell +BINANCE:btcusdt.vsell +OKEX:BTC-USDT.vsell +KRAKEN:XBT/USD.vsell +COINBASE:BTC-USD.vsell +POLONIEX:USDT_BTC.vsell +HUOBI:btcusdt.vsell +BITSTAMP:btcusd.vsell)))

allmarkets.script:
plotline(BITFINEX:BTCUSD.close, color=#97c554, title=Bitfinex.spot)
plotline(BINANCE:btcusdt.close, color=#f3ba2f, title=Binance.spot)
plotline(OKEX:BTC-USDT.close, color=#5894f2, title=Okex.spot)
plotline(KRAKEN:XBT/USD.close, color=#5841d8, title=Kraken.spot)
plotline(COINBASE:BTC-USD.close, color=#0e70e2, title=Coinbase.spot)
plotline(POLONIEX:USDT_BTC.close, color=#858b8f, title=Poloniex.spot)
plotline(HUOBI:btcusdt.close, color=#2ca6e0, title=Huobi.spot)
plotline(BITSTAMP:btcusd.close, color=#169f4a, title=Bitstamp.spot)
plotline(BITMEX:XBTUSD.close, color=#595fb5, title=Bitmex.perp)
plotline(BITFINEX:BTCF0:USTF0.close, color=#97c554, title=Bitfinex.perp)
plotline(OKEX:BTC-USD-SWAP.close, color=#5894f2, title=Okex.perp)
plotline(BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusdt.close, color=#f3ba2f, title=Binance.perp)
plotline(BINANCE_FUTURES:btcusd_perp.close, color=#f3ba2f, title=Binance.perp)
plotline(HUOBI:BTC-USD.close, color=#2ca6e0, title=Huobi.perp)
plotline(KRAKEN:PI_XBTUSD.close, color=#5841d8, title=Kraken.perp)
plotline(DERIBIT:BTC-PERPETUAL.close, color=#2dae9a, title=Deribit.perp)
plotline(FTX:BTC-PERP.close, color=#02a6c2, title=Ftx.perp)
plotline(BYBIT:BTCUSD.close, color=#f9b600, title=Bybit.perp)
allmarkets.name: All markets

ichimoku.script:
conversionLine=(lowest($price.low, options.conversionLineLength) + highest($price.high, options.conversionLineLength)) / 2
baseLine=(lowest($price.low, options.baseLineLength) + highest($price.high, options.baseLineLength)) / 2
leadLineOne=(conversionLine + baseLine) / 2
leadLineTwo=(lowest($price.low, options.laggingSpanTwoLength) + highest($price.high, options.laggingSpanTwoLength)) / 2
plotcloudarea(leadLineTwo, leadLineOne, offset=options.displacement)
ichimoku.name: Ichimoku

bollinger_bands.script:
a = sma(Math.pow($price.close,2),options.length)
b = Math.pow(sum($price.close,options.length),2)/Math.pow(options.length,2)
stdev = Math.sqrt(a - b)
src = $price.close

basis = sma($price.close, options.length)
dev = options.mult * stdev
upper = basis + dev
lower = basis - dev

plotline(basis, color=options.basisColor)
plotcloudarea(lower, upper)
bollinger_bands.name: Bollinger Bands
